channel.description: Recent content in Houdini 百科 on Houdini Wiki

item.title: ShortCodes 汇总
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: 幻灯片 .reveal-viewport span { z-index: 999; position: absolute; right: 0; margin: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; color: white; text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #000000; text-decoration: none; opacity:0; transition: opacity .5s; } .reveal-viewport span:hover { transition: opacity .5s; opacity:1; } # In the morning ___ ## Getting up - Turn off alarm - Get out of bed ___ ## Breakfast - Eat eggs - Drink coffee --- # In the evening ___

item.title: 图表功能支持
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: wavedrom { "signal": [ {"name": "CLK", "wave": "p.....|..."}, {"name":"DAT", "wave":"x.345x|=.x", "data":["A","B","C","D"]}, {"name": "REQ", "wave": "0.1..0|1.0"}, {}, {"name": "ACK", "wave": "1.....|01."} ] } Viz digraph G { subgraph cluster_0 { style=filled; color=lightgrey; node [style=filled,color=white]; a0 -> a1 -> a2 -> a3; label = "process #1"; } subgraph cluster_1 { node [style=filled]; b0 -> b1 -> b2 -> b3; label = "process #2"; color=blue } start -> a0; start -> b0; a1

item.title: Entagma Patreon- Adding Houdini to your Arsenal
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: 界面教学 Houdini 基础操作案例汇总 按 空格 键切换到摄像机控制 在节点窗口下按住 A 键拖拽可以对齐节点 在属性编辑面板按鼠标中间可以按不同数量及调整参数 创建几

item.title: 关于网站
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: 本网站基于 Hexo 静态网站生成工具构建，借助这个平台整理归纳 Houdini 的知识。 本博客完全开源，欢迎大家参与贡献分享自己关于 Houdini 的经验总结 链接 文章建议以 markdown 投稿

item.title: 更新日志
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: 2021-01-24 查 复制不起作用 BUG 封面在 tooltip 以及 list.html 罗列 文章添加封面 修正 搜索 json 图片未上传自动用 本地路径 relink 支持 slug 路径 relink 支持多个 url attachments cdn 加速 baseUrl 强制跳转 2021-01-23 制作一个卡片页

item.title: Syntax highlighting
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: Code Syntax Highlighting Verify the following code blocks render as code blocks and highlight properly. More about tuning syntax highlighting is the Hugo documentation. Vex vector pos; vector pos_all[]; for(int i = 0; i<npoints(0);i++) { pos = point(0, "P", i); //将获取到点位置信息存放到数组中 append(pos_all,pos); } //遍历数组 获取数组中
